title: NFL teams ranked by number of Super Bowl appearances all time 2020
summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of Super Bowl appearances in each Team on the y axis.
The Number of Super Bowl appearances is appeared to be the highest at Team New England Patriots and lowest at Team New Orleans Saints.
Team New Orleans Saints has 11.0 times less Number of Super Bowl appearances than Team New England Patriots which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of Super Bowl appearances in each Team on the y axis.
The maximum Number of Super Bowl appearances 11.0 is found at Team New England Patriots and the minimum is found at New Orleans Saints where Team is 1.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of Super Bowl appearances in each Team on the y axis.
The Number of Super Bowl appearances is appeared to be the highest at Team New England Patriots and lowest at Team New Orleans Saints.
Team New Orleans Saints has 11.0 times less Number of Super Bowl appearances than Team New England Patriots which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of Super Bowl appearances in the y axis.
The Number of Super Bowl appearances is highest at Team New England Patriots and lowest at Team New Orleans Saints.
Team Denver Broncos has the second highest value for Number of Super Bowl appearances.
The difference of Number of Super Bowl appearances between the highest and lowest Team is 10.0.
Team New England Patriots is higher than any other Teams with value 11.0, followed by Denver Broncos, and Denver Broncos. Down to Team New Orleans Saints with the lowest value 1.0.
Team New Orleans Saints, Arizona Cardinals, Tennessee Titans, Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Los Angeles Chargers, and New York Jets have the same Number of Super Bowl appearances.
The lowest value 1.0 at New Orleans Saints is almost 2.85 times smaller than the average value 3.86.
The Number of Super Bowl appearances is 108.0 if we add up values of all Teams.
